column41: This is the first month where Digital Economy Unit colleagues from BIS appear on the DCMS payroll. GEO still remain on DCMS payroll for this month, but will not appear in November. Figures will therefore return to normal by November, when approximately 50 GEO employees will no longer be on DCMS payroll.
